Title: Grand Master Antari
Description:
I've seen the likes of you before. A young, naive tamer that thinks that they deserve victory handed to them on a silver platter.

Well no more! I will be your reckoning, $c. I, Bloodknight Antari of Shadowmoon Valley, await the chance to show you how it feels to be obliterated in battle.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Bloodknight Antari in a pet battle.
